== About Schulux ==
Schulux is an on Ubuntu 11.10 based  Linux Operating System.
Schulux  is desinged for education use and cames whit
many Tools and Programms for education.

== Contact Information ==

Launchpad adress: http://launchpad.net/schulux

Nico Schlick: nico.schlick@me.com
Christian Weigel chris.weigel@me.com

== Software ==
- Linux Kernel 3.0.1
- Gnome 3.2
- Schulux Office 4 (based on Libre Office 3.4)
- Education Tools ( Klavaro, Kgeography, Kalgebra, Kbruch, GeoGebra, MuseScore, Stellarium.....)
- Schulux Tools ( Schulux System Tool, About Dialog, Recovery Tool, Help Tool, Schulux Dock ( Docky)
- Schulux Software Center ( based on Ubuntu Software Center)
- Frozen Bubble Schulux Edition
- Medial Player: VLC Media Player; Banshee
- System Tools ( Terminal, Texteditor, Synaptic Package Manager, Gconf...)
- Developer Tools ( Bluefish Editor, qucikly builder, Glade Interface Desinger, gedit Dev Plugins)
- Firefox 7 for Schulux
- Thunderbird 7
- Social Tools ( ICQ for Mac ( via Adobe Air ); Skype)
- Shotwell
- Gnome Shell Extensions ( Gnome Tweak Tool )
and much much more...

== Goals ==
Our Goal is to build a free System for Education
